item.title: Neural Network (2) : Inference Using Perceptron and MCMC
item.description: Single neuron still has a lot to say In the post of the first neural network tutorial, we studied a perceptron as a simple supervised learning machine. The perceptron is an amazing structure to understanding inference. In the post of the first neural network tutorial, I said I would leave you to find the objective function and and draw the plot of it. I just introduce here. Objective function and its contour plot.
